overview: "This silent film is more of an assembly, than an edit with a point of view. The footage is from my final rolls of the venerable Kodak Super-8 film stocks, Plus-x and Kodachrome. Plus-X was kodak's first film, and it's longest in continuous production [...] Plus-X movie film will be missed as much as the magnificent Kodachrome [...] footage was shot in october and november of 2010 for my film "aka martha's vineyard."
title: r.i.p. kodachrome and plus-x
